channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Police to release 'person of interest' in Brown University mass shooting
item.description: Officials are still searching for the gunman who opened fire at Brown University Saturday, killing two people and injuring nine. Police are releasing a man who was held as a person of interest.
item.content:encoded: Officials are still searching for the gunman who opened fire at Brown University Saturday, killing two people and injuring nine. Police are releasing a man who was held as a person of interest.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Ex-Homeland Security official talks about mass shooting at Brown University
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with former Homeland Security official Juliette Kayyem about the security implications of the mass shooting at Brown University and her personal response to the tragedy.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with former Homeland Security official Juliette Kayyem about the security implications of the mass shooting at Brown University and her personal response to the tragedy.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: National Trust for Historic Preservation sues to stop Trump's ballroom construction
item.description: The National Trust for Historic Preservation has filed a lawsuit to stop the construction of President Trump's ballroom
item.content:encoded: The National Trust for Historic Preservation has filed a lawsuit to stop the construction of President Trump's ballroom
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Officials say two gunmen killed at least 15 people in a shooting in Sydney, Police release "person of interest" in Brown University shooting, House to vote on plans to address rising health prices.
item.content:encoded: Officials say two gunmen killed at least 15 people in a shooting in Sydney, Police release "person of interest" in Brown University shooting, House to vote on plans to address rising health prices.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Ukrainian president to meet with U.S. envoys in Berlin to continue peace talks
item.description: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelenskyy will meet with Trump administration negotiators in Berlin Monday for continued talks on how to end war between Russia and Ukraine.
item.content:encoded: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelenskyy will meet with Trump administration negotiators in Berlin Monday for continued talks on how to end war between Russia and Ukraine.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kakissis

item.title: Deadly attack on U.S. forces highlights challenges facing Syria's new president
item.description: The deadly attack on U.S. forces in Syria underscores the challenges facing the new Syrian president one year into his rule of the fractious nation.
item.content:encoded: The deadly attack on U.S. forces in Syria underscores the challenges facing the new Syrian president one year into his rule of the fractious nation.
item.dc:creator: Jane Arraf

item.title: Police in L.A. investigating double homicide at the home of director Rob Reiner
item.description: The LAPD is investigating the deaths of two people from an apparent homicide at the home of director Rob Reiner.
item.content:encoded: The LAPD is investigating the deaths of two people from an apparent homicide at the home of director Rob Reiner.
item.dc:creator: Steve Futterman

item.title: Entertainment industry remembers Rob Reiner's six-decade career in TV and film
item.description: Rob Reiner's career as an actor and director spanned six decades. The entertainment industry is honoring his legacy and mourning the reported deaths of Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner.
item.content:encoded: Rob Reiner's career as an actor and director spanned six decades. The entertainment industry is honoring his legacy and mourning the reported deaths of Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner.
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: At least 15 killed in mass shooting at Hanukkah celebration on Bondi Beach
item.description: A father and son acting together killed at least 15 people in a mass shooting at a Hanukkah celebration on Bondi Beach in Sydney, Australia, on Sunday, according to officials.
item.content:encoded: A father and son acting together killed at least 15 people in a mass shooting at a Hanukkah celebration on Bondi Beach in Sydney, Australia, on Sunday, according to officials.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Australian Jewish organization official on mass shooting on Sydney's Bondi Beach
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks to Jamie Hyams, director of public affairs for the Australia Israel & Jewish Affairs Council, about the mass shooting at a Hanukkah celebration on Sydney's Bondi Beach.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks to Jamie Hyams, director of public affairs for the Australia Israel & Jewish Affairs Council, about the mass shooting at a Hanukkah celebration on Sydney's Bondi Beach.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep
